function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limits on research approaches during the pandemic may result in important gaps in knowledge generation.","Impact":"Reduced understanding of social aspects of energy and research transparency.","Mitigation":"Implement flexible and adaptable research approaches, collaborate with diverse stakeholders, and prioritize transparency in research practices.","Technologies":"Online collaboration tools, remote data collection technologies, and virtual research platforms.","People":"Researchers, energy industry stakeholders, and policymakers.","Owner":"Researchers, research institutions, and funding organizations."},{"Description":"Direct applicability of the paper may be limited due to the pandemic situation.","Impact":"Delay in the implementation of insights and recommendations from the paper.","Mitigation":"Publish updates and adapt recommendations to changing circumstances, prioritize short-term applicability, and maintain open communication with stakeholders.","Technologies":"Online publishing platforms, communication tools, and real-time data analysis technologies.","People":"Readers, energy industry professionals, and policymakers.","Owner":"Authors, research institutions, and publishing organizations."},{"Description":"Enduring relevance of the considerations in the paper for energy social science and research practices.","Impact":"Potential to contribute to widespread use of transparent, contextually aware, and valid research practices in the long-term.","Mitigation":"Promote the integration of social science in energy research, advocate for transparent and contextually aware research practices, and support education and training in research ethics and transparency.","Technologies":"Online education platforms, data analysis tools, and collaborative research platforms.","People":"Researchers, educators, and industry professionals.","Owner":"Academic institutions, professional associations, and research funding organizations."}]}
